Lichess Board: Grey Wooden Chess Board
Mastodon Advanced Proportional Columns
data.description:
Mastodon's "advanced web interface" has statically sized columns that don't fill the page when you only have a couple of columns pinned.

This style will sets the toot drawer to 20% of the page width, the first pinned column, (whatever it is) to about 50% of the page width, and the last column to 30%. When only those three are on the page you get a nicely balanced three-column layout.

Additionally, when you have more columns, the first and last try to retain some proportionality while they shrink to accommodate the new columns, and standard behaviour is retained when the number of columns exceeds the page width.

data.name: CleanTube 2 New April Update
data.description: CleanTube 2 is improvement on YouTube's Design. It features Custom Themed Day & Night Mode with emphases in beauty and care of users eye. CleanTube 2 improves the best qualities of its successor and implement Google Material 2 to the latest installment. Customize Options: - Custom Night Theme choice - Frosted Items - Classic WATCHED mark on videos - Classic Like and Dislike Meter - Different Searchbox Style Options Check out my other Themes: CleanGoogle v2 2020 Update Coming Soon!!! CleanDribbble v2 2020 Update CleanUnsplash v2 2020 Update Coming Soon!!! Gallery: CleanTube Day Mode (New) CleanTube Night Mode (New)
